name: RoboHelp RTA Data File
summary: Learn about .RTA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: RTA files are not meant to be opened manually. Instead they are used by RoboHelp internally when editing projects.

description: Project data file created by RoboHelp, a multi-platform help authoring system; saved as one of several files of a RoboHelp project and contains information used internally by RoboHelp when opening and saving projects.
